description:
godoc: show packages matching a query at the top

Also: fix layout of textual search results and
fix a field reference in the respective template.

Fixes issue 1987.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9f6ba9d6ec0a ***

godoc: show packages matching a query at the top

Also: fix layout of textual search results and
fix a field reference in the respective template.

Fixes issue 1987.

R=rsc, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/4962061

subject: code review 4962061: godoc: show packages matching a query at the top
